name: MechWarrior 3050
overview: It is the year 3050. The universe is a brutal and violent place. The galaxy is racked by a devastating war waged by massive 75-ton BattleMechs with the most ruinous weapons systems of the 31st century. It's up to MechWarriors like you to pilot the MadCat Heavy OmniTech on desperate missions against enemy installations. Alone against the relentless onslaught of enemy defenders, you'll need skill and cunning to knock out your objectives! Steer your lethal 'Mech into the savage fury of metal-shredding attackers - and lay waste to all before you with the MadCat's incredible firepower! Fight to the last for a victory that will bring you honor and glory. But if honor isn't motivation enough, remember that the enemy takes no prisoners... - Employ nine devastating weapons systems to obliterate enemy resistance! - Battle the ground defenses of the inner sphere on give different planets! - Take on the enemy in 2-player cooperative mode - one player steers while the other controls the MadCat's weapons systems!
